items.title: As Trump Pushes on Russia-Ukraine Peace Plan, Zelensky’s Options Are Narrowing
items.description: The Ukrainian president’s options are narrowing as he is confronted with a 28-point proposal drafted by American and Russian envoys.

items.title: America Is Setting a Trap for Itself
items.description: The United States, not China, seems determined to upend the global order.

items.title: The Fate of Google’s Ad Tech Monopoly Is Now in a Judge’s Hands
items.description: A judge queried lawyers about whether a breakup made sense during closing arguments on how to fix the tech giant’s dominance in online advertising.

items.title: The female crash test dummy has been a long time coming — but she isn't here yet

items.title: South Africa hosts G20 as tensions with U.S. flare amid boycott
items.description: The U.S. boycotts South Africa's G20 summit, sparking a diplomatic spat and throwing the global gathering into turmoil.

items.title: Survivors Describe Deadly Snowstorm in Chilean Patagonia
